entity.name: Icon
entity.query: SELECT CASE WHEN r.name = 'AUDIO' THEN 'audiotrack' WHEN r.name = 'IMAGE' THEN 'image' WHEN r.name = 'VIDEO' OR r.name = 'BROADCAST' THEN 'ondemand_video' WHEN r.name = 'DEMONSTRATION' OR r.name = 'PRESENTATION' THEN 'dvr' WHEN r.name = 'ASSESSMENT' OR r.name = 'DRILLANDPRACTICE' THEN 'assessment' WHEN r.name = 'TOOL' OR r.name = 'APPLICATION' THEN 'web_asset' WHEN r.name = 'EDUCATIONALGAME' OR r.name = 'ROLEPLAY' OR r.name = 'SIMULATION' THEN 'casino' WHEN r.name = 'CASESTUDY' OR r.name = 'ENQUIRYORIENTEDACTIVITY' OR r.name = 'EXPERIMENT' OR r.name = 'EXPLORATION' OR r.name = 'OPENACTIVITY' OR r.name = 'PROJECT' THEN 'assignment' WHEN r.name = 'WEBSITE' OR r.name = 'WEBLOG' OR r.name = 'WIKI' OR r.name = 'GLOSSARY' OR r.name = 'REFERENCE' OR r.name = 'BOOKMARKSHARINGPLATFORM' OR r.name = 'IMAGESHARINGPLATFORM' OR r.name = 'REFERENCESHARINGPLATFORM' OR r.name = 'SOUNDSHARINGPLATFORM' OR r.name = 'VIDEOSHARINGPLATFORM' OR r.name = 'OTHER' OR r.name = 'DATA' THEN 'web' ELSE 'description' END AS icon FROM Material m LEFT JOIN ( SELECT mr.material, mr.resourceType AS resourceType FROM Material_ResourceType mr WHERE mr.material = '${Material.id}' LIMIT 1 ) a ON a.material = m.id LEFT JOIN ResourceType r ON r.id = a.resourceType WHERE m.id = '${Material.id}'
